mapper.select: select * from (select point from point where memberid=#{memberId} order by regdate desc) where rownum=1
select count(*) from point where memberid=#{memberId}

select memberId, isIncome, price, fn_date(regDate) regDate, point from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from point where memberid=#{memberId} order by regdate desc) a) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into point values(#{memberId}, 0, #{price}, fn_datetochar(sysdate), (select * from (select point from point where memberid=#{memberId} order by regdate desc) where rownum=1)+#{price})
insert into point values(#{memberId}, 1, #{price}, fn_datetochar(sysdate), (select * from (select point from point where memberid=#{memberId} order by regdate desc) where rownum=1)-#{price})
